H0.text: Which illness caused Edward VII's coronation to be delayed by six weeks. Pneumonia

H1.text: Which illness caused Edward VII's coronation to be delayed by six weeks. Influenza

H2.text: Which illness caused Edward VII's coronation to be delayed by six weeks. Typhoid Fever

H3.text: Which illness caused Edward VII's coronation to be delayed by six weeks. Appendictic

A4.text: The King had been taken ill with an abdominal abscess that required immediate surgery.

A5.text: The King is suffering from perityphlitis.

A6.text: Edward's coronation had originally been scheduled for 26 June 1902. However, two days before, he was diagnosed with appendicitis.
